generated_doNotEdit.title: Work Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows the NPC to use the POI

fields.title: Active Time
fields.description: The amount of ticks the NPC will stay in their the work location

fields.title: Can Work In Rain
fields.description: If true, this entity can work when their jobsite POI is being rained on.

fields.title: Goal Cooldown
fields.description: The amount of ticks the goal will be on cooldown before it can be used again

fields.title: Arrival
fields.description: Event to run when the mob reaches their jobsite.

fields.title: Sound Delay Max
fields.description: The max interval in which a sound will play.

fields.title: Sound Delay Min
fields.description: The min interval in which a sound will play.

fields.title: Speed Multiplier
fields.description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal

fields.title: Work In Rain Tolerance
fields.description: If "can_work_in_rain" is false, this is the maximum number of ticks left in the goal where rain will not interrupt the goal

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
